member.summary: The Id value will be indexed and stored in the index file. The value should correspond to the identifier of the originating entity. member.name: P:Litium.Framework.Search.Indexing.IndexDocument.Boost
member.summary:
A value indicating the relevance of the searchable content of this index entry, relative to other entries.
The value is zero by default. Setting the value to something higher than zero will improve this document's rankning.
Setting the value to a negative number has no effect on the rankning.
